# rsa machine
Cryptography

## Challenge 

nc rsamachine.wpictf.xyz 31337 (or 31338 or 31339)

made by barry b.

## Solution

#### RSA Chosen Ciphertext Attack

	rsa_machine $ python3 solve.py 
	Received: -----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
	MIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIBCgKCAQEAtCp1JTjckvHwE5SUsgJx
